You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &shchcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&SHCHcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0429/index.htm U+00429].
  * `&shchcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0449/index.htm U+00449].
